Package tw.wenthink.yeemo.smallmessage.api

Interface YeemoSMS

All Known Implementing Classes:
YeemoSMSApiProvider
public interface YeemoSMS
Yeemo Small Message MC Plugin API

Important: You must obtain the API instance in YeemoSmallMessagePlugin before use. YeemoSmallMessagePlugin.getInstance().getAPI()

Since:
1.0.0
